name: EntityLegalFormScheme
definition: scheme that specifies the elements of the codes for entity legal forms, such as those that are sanctioned in a given jurisdiction as defined in ISO 20725
label: entity legal form scheme

name: EntityLegalForm
label: entity legal form
definition: a classifier for a legal entity that indicates the nature of that entity as defined from a legal or regulatory perspective, in the jurisdiction in which it was established

name: RelationshipRecord
label: relationship record
definition: a record describing relationships between legal entities

name: EntityLegalFormIdentifier
label: entity legal form identifier
definition: code that denotes an entity legal form as defined in ISO 20275

name: LegalEntityIdentifier
definition: an organization identifier that uniquely identifies a legal person as defined in ISO 17442
label: legal entity identifier

name: RelationshipStatus
definition: a classifier that specifies the status of the relationship between consolidated entities during the reporting period (active or inactive)
label: relationship status

name: LegalEntityIdentifierScheme
definition: a scheme that specifies the elements of an unambiguous legal entity identifier (LEI) scheme to identify the legal entities relevant to any financial transaction
label: legal entity identifier scheme

name: ContractuallyCapableEntity
label: contractually capable entity
definition: a unique entity that is legally or financially responsible for the performance of financial transactions, or has the legal right in its jurisdiction to enter independently into legal contracts, regardless of whether it is incorporated or constituted in some other way (e.g. trust, partnership, contractual). This excludes natural persons, but includes governmental organizations and supranationals.

name: AccountingFramework
definition: framework, including policies, methods, rules, and processes, used to measure, recognize, present, and disclose the information appearing in an entity's financial statements, and, from a legal ownership perspective, that is applied for accounting consolidation determination
label: accounting framework

name: RelationshipQualifier
definition: a classifier that qualifies something about the relationship between consolidated entities during the reporting period, such as the accounting framework used
label: relationship qualifier

name: RelationshipPeriodQualifier
label: relationship period qualifier
definition: a classifier that qualifies something about the reporting period specified, such as that the date period reflects an accounting or document filing period

name: LEIRegisteredEntity
label: LEI registered entity
explanatoryNote: Note that the GLEIF data includes multiple LEIs for some entities due to corporate actions or other situations. The duplicates are typically archived after some period of time, but in order to reflect the reality in the data, the restriction is modeled as someValuesFrom rather than exactly 1 LEI for a given entity.
definition: a legal person that has registered for and is identified by a legal entity identifier

name: DocumentFilingPeriod
label: document filing period
definition: a qualifier indicating that the relationship period reflects the validity period for any regulatory filing, accounting document, other document demonstrating the relationship's validity

name: hasLegalFormAbbreviation
label: has legal form abbreviation
definition: the precise abbreviation for the entity legal form as defined in the jurisdiction in which it is registered, for example LLC, LLP, Ltd, PLC, Corp.

name: OtherAccountingFramework
definition: an accounting framework of unstated origin (other than IFRS or US GAAP)
label: other accounting framework

name: hasTransliteratedLegalFormAbbreviation
definition: a transliterated (i.e., in Latin or Romanized ASCII) representation of the abbreviation for the entity legal form
label: has transliterated legal form abbreviation

name: hasLegalForm
label: has legal form
definition: indicates the nature of the entity as defined from a legal or regulatory perspective in a given jurisdiction

name: AccountingPeriod
label: accounting period
definition: qualifier indicating that the relationship period reflects the period of time covered by the most recent validation documents from an accounting perspective for this relationship

name: ISO17442-CodeSet
definition: the set of legal entity identifiers that comprise the ISO 17442 legal entity identifier specification
label: ISO 17442 code set

name: hasOwnershipPercentage
label: has ownership percentage
definition: the percentage ownership interest in the owned entity owned by owning entity, if known

name: isUltimatelyConsolidatedBy
definition: indicates that the entity considered the 'end node' or consolidating entity (parent) fully consolidates the accounting of the 'start node' (child) per the accounting rules specified, and is the most distant consolidating entity to that child in any applicable ownership hierarchy
label: is ultimately consolidated by

name: hasLegalAddress
label: has legal address
definition: indicates the legal address for the entity, in the jurisdiction in which the entity is established, used for registration purposes with respect to obtaining an LEI

name: RelationshipStatusInactive
label: relationship status - inactive
definition: status indicating that it has been determined that the relationship ended, e.g. because entity that reported this relationship is no longer legally registered and/or operating; or the relationship is no longer valid for other reasons

name: isDirectlyConsolidatedBy
definition: indicates that the entity considered the 'end node' or consolidating entity (parent) fully consolidates the accounting of the 'start node' (child) per the accounting rules specified, and is the closest consolidating entity to that child in any applicable ownership hierarchy
label: is directly consolidated by

name: isInternationalBranchOf
definition: indicates that the entity considered the 'start node' or consolidated entity (child) is an international subsidiary of the 'end node' (parent) in the jurisdiction of the child
label: is an international branch of

name: GenerallyAcceptedAccountingPrinciples
label: Generally Accepted Accounting Principles
definition: an accounting framework developed by the US Financial Accounting Standards Board (FASB)

name: ISO20275-CodeSet
definition: the set of entity legal form identifiers that comprise the ISO 20275 entity legal form specification
label: ISO 20275 code set

name: isConsolidationOf
definition: indicates the entity considered the 'start node' or consolidated entity from an ISO 17442 perspective
label: is consolidation of

name: InternationalFinancialReportingStandard
definition: an accounting framework developed by the International Accounting Standards Board (IASB)
label: International Financial Reporting Standard

name: isQuantifiedBy
definition: indicates that something is limited to or conditional due to some rate or other statistical value
label: is quantified by

name: RelationshipStatusActive
definition: status indicating that as of the last report or update, the reporting legal entity reported that it is legally registered and/or operating, and that the relationship detailed in this relationship record is still valid
label: relationship status - active

name: hasTransliteratedName
definition: a transliterated (i.e., in Latin or Romanized ASCII) representation of a name for the entity
label: has transliterated name

name: isConsolidatedBy
label: is consolidated by
definition: indicates the entity considered the 'end node' or consolidating entity (parent) from an ISO 17442 perspective
